title: Party leaders to meet today (2)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Party leaders will be meeting in Parliament on Thursday (2) at 9.30 am.
The next Parliamentary Week and the Bills to be debated will be discussed at the meeting.
Parliament is scheduled to reconvene on the 7th of June at 10 AM.
Sri Lanka: President appoints Commission of Inquiry to probe recent violence
Sri Lanka’s Police Chief in Court, says does not have power to transfer Deshabandu
